metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15612 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
mistune.py in Mistune 0.7.4 allows XSS via an unexpected newline (such as in java\nscript:) or a crafted email address, related to the escape and autolink functions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-15612` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-mistune - 0.8.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mistune package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.3-2').
